ygData.subject: Re: Heritrix3 frontier becoming corrupted and/or deadlocked after ClassCastExceptions
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Kris, I ve not been able to fully debug this. I was trying to run crawls with large numbers of ToeThreads (1000), and the issues seem to arise then, as
